mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(memno, nickname, id, pw , phonenum, email, address, companyNo, birth, rank, name, auth, fullname) values(memNo_seq.nextval, #{nickName}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{phoneNum}, #{email}, #{address}, #{companyNo}, #{birth}, #{rank}, #{name}, 0, #{fullName})
mapper.update: update member set nickname = #{nickName}, pw = #{pw}, phoneNum = #{phoneNum}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, companyNo = #{companyNo ,jdbcType=NUMERIC} where memno = #{memNo}
UPDATE MEMBER SET SESSIONKEY = #{sessionId}, SESSIONLIMIT = #{next} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT* FROM MEMBER WHERE SESSIONKEY = #{value} AND SESSIONLIMIT > SYSDATE
select count(*) from member where id = #{id}
select count(*) from member where nickname = #{nickname}
